member.name: T:ifc.ifc_ci
member.summary: Provide access to IFC system via IFC-CI00.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_ci class using the specified COM Port.
member.param: The COM Port connected to IFC-CI00. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.#ctor(System.Byte)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_ci class using the specified COM Port.
member.param: The COM Port connected to IFC-CI00. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led1(System.Byte)
member.param: 1 to ON and 0 to OFF. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led1(System.Int32)
member.param: 1 to ON and 0 to OFF. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led1(System.Boolean)
member.param: True to ON and False to OFF. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led2(System.Byte)
member.param: 1 to ON and 0 to OFF. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led2(System.Int32)
member.param: 1 to ON and 0 to OFF. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led2(System.Boolean)
member.param: True to ON and False to OFF. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led3(System.Byte)
member.param: 1 to ON and 0 to OFF. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led3(System.Int32)
member.param: 1 to ON and 0 to OFF. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led3(System.Boolean)
member.param: True to ON and False to OFF. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led4(System.Byte)
member.param: 1 to ON and 0 to OFF. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led4(System.Int32)
member.param: 1 to ON and 0 to OFF. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led4(System.Boolean)
member.param: True to ON and False to OFF. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led(System.Int32)
member.summary: To control LED 1 to LED 4 on IFC-CI00.
member.param: Bit 0 control LED 1, bit 1 control LED 2, bit 2 control LED 3, and bit 3 control LED 4. Representative bit set to ON LED, clear to OFF. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_led(System.Byte)
member.summary: To control LED 1 to LED 4 on IFC-CI00.
member.param: Bit 0 control LED 1, bit 1 control LED 2, bit 2 control LED 3, and bit 3 control LED 4. Representative bit set to ON LED, clear to OFF. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_smclr(System.Byte)
member.summary: To control Slave Reset of IFC system.
member.param: 1 to reset Slave and 0 to release Slave from reset. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_smclr(System.Int32)
member.summary: To control Slave Reset of IFC system.
member.param: 1 to reset Slave and 0 to release Slave from reset. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_smclr(System.Boolean)
member.summary: To control Slave Reset of IFC system.
member.param: True to reset Slave and False to release Slave from reset. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_buzzer(System.Byte)
member.param: 1 to activate Buzzer and 0 to deactivate Buzzer. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_buzzer(System.Int32)
member.param: 1 to activate Buzzer and 0 to deactivate Buzzer. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ci.ci_buzzer(System.Boolean)
member.param: True to activate Buzzer and False to deactivate Buzzer. (bool)
